SEARCH
Modul CineTrack
Package org.com.model.repository

Klasse AbstractRepository

java.lang.Object
org.com.model.repository.AbstractRepository
Bekannte direkte Unterklassen:
CinematicRepository, LogRepository, UserRepository
public abstract class AbstractRepository extends Object
Abstract base class for repository implementations using Hibernate SessionFactory. Provides a common constructor and session management for database-related repositories.

Subclasses must implement specific data access methods for their respective entities.

Version:
1.0
Autor:
Umut

  • Methodendetails

    • executeWithinTransaction

      protected <T> T executeWithinTransaction(AbstractRepository.DatabaseOperation<T> operation, String errorMessage)
      Executes a database operation within a transaction.
      Parameter:
      operation - Database operation to execute
      errorMessage - Error message for transaction failure
      Gibt zurück:
      Result of the database operation
      Löst aus:
      AbstractRepository.RepositoryException - If transaction fails
